name: Reach Out (and grab a hold of your goals)
name_original: Reach Out (and grab a hold of your goals)
description:
The second game in a project to release 6 games in 2019 with a game released every two months.

Sometimes you live with executive dysfunction, sometimes you're depressed, sometimes you're anxious, sometimes it's just really hard to live like a person! Maybe rather than seeing it like a challenge, imagine yourself reaching out to your goals, grabbing them, and putting them in a place where you can do something about it.

Use what precious energy you have and try to accomplish five tasks you need to complete today, but maybe this time you can do it. Aim to best your high scores!

Controls:
(click into the game window a second time in order to gain control)
[Space] - Activate the crane and select levels
[Arrow keys] - Navigate the level select

Note: your speakers aren't broken, there is no sound! sorry about that!
